topics.title: Filling in the Gaps
topics.description:
It seems like most Node.js intros/tutorials are some variant of building a RESTful app server with express.js. While this is a great way to get up and running quickly, it fails to address the core principles, patterns, and pitfalls of production Node.js development. This discussion is meant to eliminate "deep magic" and fill in gaps for Node.js developers at all levels of experience. 

Topics include: 
- Async, non-blocking I/O, and other buzzwords  
- Node in Production (automation, deploying, scaling, and calls)

speaker.name: Mark Wilkerson
speaker.bio: Mark is the technical co-founder of SpeakUp (http://getspeakup.com), a Node.js based startup in OC. Before that he worked @ Blizzard Entertainment and Dell.
